meanings.definition: A short novel or long short story.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy reading novellas before bedtime.
meanings.sent2: She wrote a collection of novellas that became popular.
meanings.sent3: The novellas on the bookshelf whispered stories of adventure.
meanings.sent4: Her imagination soared as she dove into the world of novellas.
meanings.sent5: The vivid characters in the novellas felt like old friends.

meanings.definition: A work of fiction that is longer than a short story but shorter than a novel.
meanings.sent1: Novellas are perfect for quick reading sessions.
meanings.sent2: The bookstore had a special section dedicated to novellas.
meanings.sent3: The novellas in the library seemed to be having a secret meeting.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a treasure trove filled with novellas waiting to be explored.
meanings.sent5: The novellas painted a colorful picture of the author's creativity.
